text: Peel more garlic than the recipe requires. This will give you a supply for the next one or two meals. Mince or chop as usual.  Place the excess garlic into a clean jar that has a lid. Cover with olive oil. Store in the refrigerator. Remove and add to dishes as needed. Use up within a week. Make a new batch the next time you're cooking with garlic.
